title: Ford to build U.S. battery plant with Chinese technology as political tensions rise

title: AI porn is easy to make now. For women, that’s a nightmare.
description: Deepfakes, OnlyFans, revenge porn: The internet is weighing the costs of accessible AI imaging.

title: Now for sale: Data on your mental health
description: For years, data brokers have collected and resold Americans’ personal information. But the pandemic-fueled rise telehealth and therapy apps has spurred an even more contentious product line: Americans’ mental health data.
